function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 in hospital water, tap water, and domestic sewage","Impact":"Potential for transmission of the virus through contaminated water sources","Mitigation":"Implement effective water treatment and disinfection methods","Technologies":"Chlorination, chlorine dioxide, ultraviolet, sodium hypochlorite","People":"Patients, hospital staff, general public","Owner":"Water treatment facilities, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Persistence of SARS-CoV-2 at low temperatures and in urine and stools","Impact":"Increases the risk of exposure to the virus in colder environments and through human waste","Mitigation":"Adopting measures to disinfect and sanitize colder environments and sewage systems","Technologies":"Chlorination, chlorine dioxide, ultraviolet, sodium hypochlorite","People":"General public, sanitation workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, sanitation departments"},{"Description":"Decreasing efficacy of disinfectant techniques in wastewater","Impact":"Reduces the effectiveness of wastewater treatment in removing the virus","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and adjustment of disinfection methods","Technologies":"Ozone, chlorine dioxide, chlorine","People":"Patients, hospital staff, general public","Owner":"Water treatment facilities, public health authorities"}]}
